mapper.select: SELECT `activity_name` AS 活动名称 ,`fk_user_id` AS 负责人,`activity_type` AS 类型, `activity_budget` AS 预算, `activity_actual_number` AS 实际参加人数,`activity_planned_start_date` AS 计划开始时间,`activity_planned_end_date` AS 计划结束时间, `activity_approval_process` AS 审批状态, `activity_circulation_date` AS 流转时间,`activity_approval_result` AS 审批结果,`activity_founder` AS 创建人, `activity_gmt_create` AS 创建时间 FROM `market_activity`
